import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";/* React Widget (buttons) which appears after a document-independent question was asked.
   - 'Yes': go back to initial options
   - 'Rephrase': ask another document-independent question
   - 'More Results': Results shift from 1 to 4
   */var MoreOptions=function MoreOptions(props){//console.log("m.opt:",props['howManyQs'])
var optionsM=[{text:"Yes, I would like to ask something else.",handler:props.actionProvider.handleInitialOptions,id:1},{text:"No, I would like to rephrase my question.",handler:props.actionProvider.handleOtherSetup,id:2},{text:"No, I would like to see More Results",handler:props.actionProvider.handleOther,id:3}];//rn up to 4 new results are supported. can be changed
if(props['howManyQs']==4){optionsM=optionsM.slice(0,2);}var buttonsMarkup=optionsM.map(function(option){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:option.handler,className:"option-button",children:option.text},option.id);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"options-container",children:buttonsMarkup});};export default MoreOptions;
